headline: Does Private Markets and Crypto Indexing Momentum Change The Bull Case For MSCI (MSCI)?
summary: In recent days, SimCorp and MSCI expanded their data collaboration to streamline access to aggregated private market datasets for buy-side firms, while MSCI also confirmed it will not exclude digital asset treasuries from its indexes for now and highlighted growing pressure on private credit loans in 2026. Together with analysts’ upgraded expectations for double‑digit quarterly earnings and revenue growth across MSCI’s key segments, these developments underscore the firm’s role at the...
